org.insa.java.view

Class JavaChatGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.insa.java.view.JavaChatGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FromUser, ToUser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingChatGUI

    public abstract class JavaChatGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements FromUser, ToUser
    Generic graphic interface for java-based application.
    Author:
    thomas thiebaud, unaï sanchez
